Name: MVPA for motor adaptation
Funding: Bio & Medical Technology Development Program of the National Research Foundation (NRF) and Korean government (MSIT) [NRF2019M3E5D2A01066265]

Pilot Project for Commercialization of Police Technology Public Research through the Commercializations Promotion Agency for R&D Outcomes funded by the National Police Agency and the Ministry of Science, ICT & Future Planning (Grant no: 1711174175)
HowToAcknowledge: Song Y, Shin W, Kim P and Jeong J (2023) Neural representations for multi-context visuomotor adaptation and the impact of common representation on multi-task performance: a multivariate decoding approach. Front. Hum. Neurosci. 17:1221944. doi: 10.3389/fnhum.2023.1221944
EthicsApprovals: All participants provided written informed consent, and the Institutional Review Board of the Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology approved the study (approval number: KH2019-164).
